<figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width lead"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img class="js-image-replace" alt="Argentine soccer player Lionel Messi and his wife Antonela Roccuzzo make an appearance for the press at their wedding in Rosario, Argentina, 30 June 2017." src="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/2125/production/_96758480_b597b1c4-66df-4319-9825-c424757ad527.jpg" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">Reuters</span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Messi first met his future bride when he was just five years old </span> </figcaption> </figure><p class="story-body__introduction">Argentine football star Lionel Messi has married his childhood sweetheart in his hometown in what has been called the "wedding of the century".</p><p>A civil ceremony for Messi, 30, and Antonela Roccuzzo, 29, was held at a luxury hotel in the city of Rosario.</p><p>Football stars and celebrities were among the 260 guests, with hundreds of police deployed for the event. </p><p>Messi, the Argentina and Barcelona forward, met Roccuzzo as a child before he moved to Spain aged just 13. </p><p>Among the guests at Friday's wedding were Messi's Barcelona teammates Luis Suárez, Neymar, Gerard Piqué and his wife, Colombia's pop star Shakira. A number of guests flew into Rosario on private jets. </p><p>Argentina's Clarín newspaper has variously called the wedding "the wedding of the year" and "the wedding of the century".</p><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/28F5/production/_96758401_4376aaf9-0948-4530-9632-d83bf0c75876.jpg" Xavi Hernandez, Cesc Fabregas and Carles Puyol and their wives pose on a red carpet upon arrival to attend Argentine football star Lionel Messi and Antonella Roccuzzo" s="" wedding="" in="" rosario,="" santa="" fe="" province,="" argentina="" on="" 30="" june="" 2017"="" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP</span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Many of Messi's former teammates, including Xavi Hernandez, Cesc Fàbregas and Carles Puyol attended with their partners </span> </figcaption> </figure><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/7715/production/_96758403_a7a6ce8d-86e7-44e8-a620-e8c422b4e1fb.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/7715/production/_96758403_a7a6ce8d-86e7-44e8-a620-e8c422b4e1fb.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Argentine footballer Ezequiel Lavezzi and his wife pose on a red carpet upon arrival to attend Argentine football star Lionel Messi and Antonella Roccuzzo" s="" wedding="" in="" rosario,="" santa="" fe="" province,="" argentina="" on="" 30="" june="" 2017."="" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP</span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Argentine footballer Ezequiel Lavezzi was also spotted on the red carpet </span> </figcaption> </figure><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/F3A7/production/_96757326_040348080-1.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/F3A7/production/_96757326_040348080-1.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Gerard Piqué (left) alongside his wife, Shakira, and airport staff in Rosario" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP</span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Gerard Piqué (left) and his wife Shakira posed for a picture with airport staff as they arrived in Rosario </span> </figcaption> </figure><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/CAD5/production/_96752915_a96c0579-2a82-44c6-98a8-b866eb8dbedd.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/CAD5/production/_96752915_a96c0579-2a82-44c6-98a8-b866eb8dbedd.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Crowds outside the hotel where Lionel Messi's wedding takes place in Rosario, Argentina. Photo: 30 June 2017" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">Reuters</span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Crowds gathered outside the hotel in Rosario </span> </figcaption> </figure><p>Earlier, crowds gathered at the local airport to try to spot some of the famous guests.</p><p>A private security firm was working inside the hotel to keep out potential gatecrashers. </p><p>About 150 journalists received accreditation to enter a special press area, but were not given full access to the venue, organisers said. </p><h2 class="story-body__crosshead">Where did the bride and groom meet? </h2><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/316E/production/_96745621_b92a5fae-b7e5-4d97-baaa-911b519841e9.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/316E/production/_96745621_b92a5fae-b7e5-4d97-baaa-911b519841e9.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Artist Lisandro Urteaga paints a mural of Lionel Messi in Rosario" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP / Getty Images </span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Artist Lisandro Urteaga paints a celebratory mural of Messi on a wall in Rosario ahead of the wedding </span> </figcaption> </figure><p>Messi met Roccuzzo when he was just five years old. She is the cousin of his best friend, Lucas Scaglia, who also became a professional football player.</p><p>Messi accepted an offer to play for Barcelona when he was 13, on condition that they pay for treatment for his growth hormone deficiency. </p><ul class="story-body__unordered-list"> <li class="story-body__list-item"><a href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/world-middle-east-39853888/meet-the-iranian-messi" class="story-body__link">Meet the Iranian Messi </a></li> <li class="story-body__list-item"><a href="/news/world-latin-america-38573503" class="story-body__link">Messi statue decapitated in Buenos Aires</a></li> </ul><p>He has spoken about the difficulties he faced on leaving behind his loved ones and former club. </p><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/CDAE/production/_96745625_b0bb5d9c-a82a-4bda-8d28-292ab76485da.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/CDAE/production/_96745625_b0bb5d9c-a82a-4bda-8d28-292ab76485da.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Lionel Messi joined on the pitch by Antonela Roccuzzo and their two sons" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP / Getty Images </span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Lionel Messi is joined on the pitch by Antonela Roccuzzo and the couple's two sons </span> </figcaption> </figure><p>The couple, who now live in Barcelona, have two sons together.</p><p>In May, his appeal against a 21-month jail term for tax evasion in Spain was rejected. He is unlikely to go to prison as the sentence can be served under probation or possibly <a href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-40378718" class="story-body__link">avoided by paying a fine</a>.</p><h2 class="story-body__crosshead">What do we know about the big day?</h2><p>The event was held at Rosario's City Center hotel complex, which has an adjoining casino. </p><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/64A4/production/_96746752_rosario.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/64A4/production/_96746752_rosario.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Rosario's Hotel CityCenter set up for a previous event" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">CityCenter Rosario </span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Rosario's Hotel CityCenter set up for a previous event </span> </figcaption> </figure><p>Roccuzzo, 29, was widely expected to wear a dress by Rosa Clara, a Barcelona-based designer who has dressed actress Eva Longoria and Spain's Queen Letizia.</p><p>Aside from a "sushi station", the menu was a very Argentine affair, including empanadas (traditional pasties) and all parts of the cow, from a casserole of sweetbreads to blood sausage. </p><h2 class="story-body__crosshead">Who is on the guest list? </h2><p>Messi invited the Barcelona squad, including Neymar, Luis Suárez and Gerard Piqué, who arrived in Rosario in a private jet with his wife, Colombian pop-star Shakira.</p><p>Teammates from Argentina's national team, including Sergio Agüero, were also present. </p><p>Clarín reported that Messi did not invite any of his recent coaches, including Pep Guardiola, who is now at Manchester City.</p><p>Argentina's other big football legend, Diego Maradona, was also omitted from the list, according to the local press. </p><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/7F8E/production/_96745623_7767a7f1-d519-43b0-8ecd-ce3c5eea6821.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/7F8E/production/_96745623_7767a7f1-d519-43b0-8ecd-ce3c5eea6821.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="Uruguayan footballer Luis Suárez touches down in Rosario for teammate's big day" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP / Getty Images </span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> Uruguayan footballer Luis Suárez touches down in Rosario for his teammate's big day </span> </figcaption> </figure><h2 class="story-body__crosshead">Where is Rosario? </h2><p>The port city of Rosario sits on the banks of the Paraná, about 300km north-west of Buenos Aires in the centre of the country. </p><p>Another famous Argentine to have spent his early years here is Ernesto "Che" Guevara.</p><p>Messi is known locally simply as Lío. </p><figure class="media-landscape has-caption full-width"> <span class="image-and-copyright-container"> <img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/410/cpsprodpb/D9D4/production/_96746755_0dd70fb2-2875-4058-ba79-91dfca2776ae.jpg" datasrc="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/320/cpsprodpb/D9D4/production/_96746755_0dd70fb2-2875-4058-ba79-91dfca2776ae.jpg" class="responsive-image__img js-image-replace" alt="A mural of Che Guevara next to the Newell's Old Boys club logo" width="976" height="549" data-highest-encountered-width="410"> <span class="off-screen">Image copyright</span> <span class="story-image-copyright">AFP </span> </span> <figcaption class="media-caption"> <span class="off-screen">Image caption</span> <span class="media-caption__text"> A mural of Che Guevara next to the Newell's Old Boys club logo </span> </figcaption> </figure><p>He has been a local hero since his days as a star player for Newell's Old Boys. </p><p>The team has a staunch rivalry with nearby Rosario Central, similar to that of Boca Juniors and River Plate in Buenos Aires. </p><p>Since moving to Spain, Messi has won a record-breaking five Fifa Ballon d'Or awards. </p> </div> </div> <div class="story-more"> <div class="group
